content:
Public-Comment period until Sept 4 on a whitepaper expressing a few use-cases for use of a Directory and advise on how to use mCSD
https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/papers/mCSD/index.html
Comments welcome from anyone, you do not need to be a member to comment.

Mobile Care Services Discovery (mCSD) Use Cases White Paper - Rev. 1.1 . This white paper presents multiple use cases that mCDS supports.
https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/papers/mCSD/index.html
